messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI Universal Styler custom node?

The ComfyUI Universal Styler custom node is intended to offer a large palette of prompting scenarios based on Public Checkpoint Models or Private custom Models and LoRas. It includes an integrated learning machine process and a set of workflows.
Which versions of Stable Diffusion does ComfyUI Universal Styler support?
ComfyUI Universal Styler supports Stable Diffusion XL, 2.0, and 1.5 versions.
What are some of the working features of ComfyUI Universal Styler?

Some working features of ComfyUI Universal Styler include loading prompt presets from a CSV personal database, prompt sequences concatenation, object and background contextual editing, and clip input, condition output, and extras.
What are some of the features currently under development for ComfyUI Universal Styler?

Some features under development for ComfyUI Universal Styler include selecting database folder path in front-end, single database column per category, all fields concatenation, seed INT field with output connector for Node A, and model image-2-text inclusion and metadata read/write for Node B.
What are some of the planned features for ComfyUI Universal Styler?

Some planned features for ComfyUI Universal Styler include Image Nai-Filter (parametric), Image Nai-Tonemapper (parametric), Image Nai-transformer overlayer, Image 2 text (prompt, neg, metadata), and Text Nai-Prompter load/concat csv.
What is the recommended platform for installing ComfyUI services?
The use of Stability Matrix is suggested for installing ComfyUI services, as it is easy to install and provides a lot of controls.
What is the license under which ComfyUI Universal Styler is released?
ComfyUI Universal Styler is released under the GNU General Public License v3.0.
